title: New: Danny Brown – #HottestMC
content:
Without a doubt, the debut Danny Brown LP, Old, is my most anticipated release of 2013.

XXX was a marvel; overblown, silly, crude and at times utterly tasteless, it managed to be all those things whilst being scathingly poignant. Balancing these two strong elements is hard, and XXX didn’t perhaps always have both eyes on the ball. Old, at least in reference to what Brown has to say about it, looks set to be a more focused body of work. #HottestMC ironically won’t appear in the LP, however it’s only exciting me further.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
